modName: Main Menu Music - Fairy Tail Kizuna
summary: Simple mod that replaces the main menu music to the "Kizuna" theme from the anime Fairy Tail.
descriptionHtml:
[i][u]PLEASE NOTE: Please look at Permissions before reporting this mod for copyright infringement. It saves me and the Nexus staff a lot of hassle.[/u][/i]

Y'all like [b]Fairy Tail[/b]?

Y'all like [b]Skyrim[/b]?

Welp here's something that I lazily threw together when I got bored of the main menu music. 
[u]
Installation[/u]

Nexus Mod Manager: Just click the big shiny NMM button. Then, activate it from the manager itself and play!
Manual: Extract the .7z and place the extracted files within the Data folder in the Skyrim directory. If all goes well, you should see "FairyTailKizunaMod.esp" within the Data Files option when you boot up Skyrim.
Steam: Click the link on the mirror, subscribe, restart your game, and enjoy!

[u]Load Order[/u]

Doesn't seem to need to go anywhere specific on a load order. It may conflict with any mods that tamper with the main menu music or the main menu as a whole, however. Sorry about that. 
(Any issues with the load order, hit me up! I'll check out your issue!)

Cheerio :)
-Sprocket
author: Sprocket
